Store Management

3 min
after logging in to the admin panel, you can set up your store, add departments, configure your settings, and manage your business using the onprintshop admin you can store and manage complete client and order information using the admin panel watch along and understand how you can easily manage your store add store add store how to create a store account, and personalize their account with their branding set department & customers department & customers you can anytime add department, customers and manage store data centrally creating store branding creating store branding personalize the store web pages based on their actions, indent, and other parameters assign product & templates assign product & templates assign/unassign products to store, add markup percentages on the reatil prices store auto profiling store auto profiling these fields help you gather an individual’s personal data used in block templates manage store inventory manage store inventory manage and store finished goods until the time of delivery in a more systematic way
